Well-Formed Formulae on Operators and Operands

DM
Jun 21, 2021

Uniform Distribution

DM
Jun 20, 2021

Let $S$ be a Sample Space with $n$ events then uniform distribution will assign probability of $1/n$ to each outcome.

The Birthday Problem

DM
Jun 20, 2021

How many people are needed in one room such that probability of at least two of them having birthday at same day is greater than 1/2?

Sample Space

DM
Jun 20, 2021

Sets of all possible outcomes of an Experiment.

Random Variable

DM
Jun 20, 2021

A Functions from Sample Space of Event to real numbers.

Ramsey Theory

DM
Jun 20, 2021

It deals with distribution of subsets of elements of sets.

Ramsey Number

DM
Jun 20, 2021

$R(m, n)$ where $m$ and $n$ are positive integers tells the minimum number of people at party such that their are $m$ mutual friends or $n$ mutual enemies.

Probablistic Method

DM
Jun 20, 2021

These methods are used to create Nonconstructive Proofs Existence Proofs.
